content: Regarding the build lock (I'm assuming related to the chocolatey instability going on at the moment): I'm trying to get a build through and previously, @oli wrote @bors p=1 to try to get my build to go through. This was before the build lock. Is it ok for me to write @bors p=1 (I have rights to do @bors r=oli-obk), or should I hold off until someone higher up the chain has time or the build issues are resolved?
The priority does not get reset afaik
Just rebase and send it to bors again. Once the problems are solved the tree will be opened again
Right now all PRs below priority 1000 are on hold
Ok, that was what I had done previously. By "running bors" do you mean @bors r=oli-obk? That's all I've run so far
oh, I see it popped up on the homu queue again. I'll leave it alone. Thanks for such a quick respone on the weekend!
